articles.title: ASCRS 2024: Two papers demonstrate medication burden reduction and safety of a microcatheter for glaucoma - Ophthalmology Times Europe
articles.description: Dr Nir Shoham-Hazon presented two papers detailing outcomes from the iTrack microcatheter at ASCRS in Boston
articles.content: At this year's ASCRS meeting in Boston, Massachusetts, we caught up with Nir Shoham-Hazon, MD. He is the director of the Miramichi EyeNB Centre of Excellence in New Brunswick, Canada. In conversation… [+2881 chars]

articles.description: The phone was unveiled in India first, but now it and its Ultra and Fusion siblings are going around the world. The Motorola Edge 50 Pro was first...
